long_description: Skiing and snowshoeing can have you feeling hot one minute and shivering the next. The Marmot Vertical soft-shell jacket has a balance of breathability and weather protection to keep you comfortable. Breathable and easy-moving Marmot M1 four-way stretch, soft-shell fabric is bonded to a polyester fleece lining for wind-, water- and abrasion-resistant performance. Features plenty of pockets to keep your necessities handy: external zippered chest, hand and sleeve pockets, plus a zippered media pocket inside. Removable powder skirt and adjustable elastic drawcord hem help keep snow out and warmth in. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Removable storm hood features a laminated brim and an adjustable hood cord to assist visibility. PitZips(TM) allow built-up body moisture to escape. Brushed polyester tricot lining at the collar is soft next to skin; lining enhances warmth and disperses moisture. Marmot Vertical shell jacket has rip-and-stick cuffs and an elastic drawcord hem that help seal warmth in. Regular fit.
short_description: Skiing and snowshoeing can have you feeling hot one minute and shivering the next. The Marmot Vertical soft-shell jacket has a balance of breathability and weather protection to keep you comfortable.
